creditline: The Patricia and Peter Frechette Endowment for Art Acquisition
dimension:
48 × 30 in. (121.92 × 76.2 cm) (object part, a: canvas)
9 1/4 × 5 3/4 in. (23.5 × 14.61 cm) (object part, b: paper)
text: This acrylic painting features hundreds of thin blookd-red horizontal lines, like hand-written writings on a blank page. Seven meandering breaks of white canvas appear underneath. Next to the painting is accompanying typewritten text on brown paper typewritten that reads in horizontal rows “no baby”, interspersed occasionally with the words “yes baby.”
title: Story of a Woman
